abstract.text: Convenience functions around
fetching.
Quickly learn how to use SafeFetching.
is a protocol that
should implement in order to be used with SafeFetching API. It requires to define a
type that holds the members (attributes or relationships) that can be fetched, as well as a static
property to access those. A macro is provided to generate them automatically.
Start building a request and customize it to fetch one or several entities, filter them, sort them and so on.
Predicate are used within a
function when building a request. Meanwhile, a convenience function
is provided to create a
from a SafeFetching predicate.

inlineContent.text: This library offers a DSL (Domain Specific Language) to build predicates and requests to fetch a CoreData store. There are three objectives it tries to reach:
Use compiler-checking to evaluate predicates and avoid runtime errors.
Writing a request and especially a predicate should feel as natural as possible in Swift.
to fetch a CoreData store should be left behind.
